unnormalised: Organic farming, eh? My grandpa, Kishanlal, used to swear by it in his Haryana farm back in '65. No fancy chemicals, just good ol' cow dung and crop rotation. Remember that bumper crop of bajra on 26/01/1980? He said it was Mother Earth's blessing. Wish more farmers like Ramesh in our village understood the value. Maybe a workshop organized by IARI on 10/02/2024 at 11:00 hrs could help. Jai Kisan!
